list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a club or party at which people dance to recorded pop music.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: on Friday evenings, he often attended a disco with school friends

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a style of pop music intended mainly for dancing to, typically soul-influenced and melodic with a regular bass beat, popular particularly in the late 1970s.
attend or dance at a disco.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: for the next three hours he discoed nonstop
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong ba giờ tiếp theo, ông đã bỏ qua không ngừng nghỉ
